snippet.title: Wild Arms 4 gameplay classic.
snippet.description:
I used my PlayStation 2 & output in 480i on my HDTV & capture card. Desinterlacing is annoying, but I think using handbrake software is probably the safest path for getting a decent quality for uploading it on youtube.

Virtualdub is still the only way I know to get 60hz out of the 480i30.
